sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button>
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>

<style scoped>
button {
  color: #640032;
  transition: all .5s ease;
    
    border: 3px solid white;
    font-family:'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 1;
    font-size: 17px;
    background-color : transparent;
    padding: 10px;
    outline: none;
    border-color: #640032;

    border-radius: 4px;
  }
  button:hover{
  background-color: #640032;
  border-color:   background-color: #640032;
;
  color: white;
}
</style>
